title: sn74avc2t45 (1)
chunks:
["## Package Information

---

| PART NUMBER    | PACKAGE (1)     | BODY SIZE (NOM)   |
|----------------|-----------------|-------------------|
| SN74AVC2T45DCT | DCT, (SSOP, 8)  | 2.95mm × 2.80mm   |
| SN74AVC2T45DCU | DCU (VSSOP, 8)  | 2.30mm × 2.00mm   |
| SN74AVC2T45YZP | YZP (DSBGA, 8)  | 1.89mm × 0.89mm   |
| SN74AVC2T45DDF | DDF (SOT-23, 8) | 2.90mm × 1.60mm   |

---
## Table of Contents

---

|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----|

|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------|
| 9.2 Receiving Notification of Documentation Updates....19                                                                |      |

---
## Pin Functions

---

| PIN   | PIN              | PIN         |          |                                                                            |
|-------|------------------|-------------|----------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| NAME  | NO. (SM8, VSSOP) | NO. (DSBGA) | TYPE (1) | DESCRIPTION                                                                |
| VCCA  | 1                | A1          | -        | Supply Voltage A                                                           |
| VCCB  | 8                | A2          | -        | Supply Voltage B                                                           |
| GND   | 4                | D1          | -        | Ground                                                                     |
| A1    | 2                | B1          | I/O      | Output or input depending on state of DIR. Output level depends on V CCA . |
| A2    | 3                | C1          | I/O      | Output or input depending on state of DIR. Output level depends on V CCA . |
| B1    | 7                | B2          | I/O      | Output or input depending on state of DIR. Output level depends on V CCB . |
| B2    | 6                | C2          | I/O      | Output or input depending on state of DIR. Output level depends on V CCB . |
| DIR   | 5                | D2          | I        | Direction Pin, Connect to GND or to VCCA                                   |

---", "## Table 8-1. SN74AVC2T45 Pin Connections With SYSTEM-1 and SYSTEM-2

---

|   PIN | NAME   | DESCRIPTION                                                |
|-------|--------|------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | VCCA   | SYSTEM-1 supply voltage (1.2V to 3.6V)                     |
|     2 | A1     | Output level depends on V CCA .                            |
|     3 | A2     | Output level depends on V CCA .                            |
|     4 | GND    | Device GND                                                 |
|     5 | DIR    | The GND (low-level) determines B-port to A-port direction. |
|     6 | B2     | Input threshold value depends on V CCB .                   |
|     7 | B1     | Input threshold value depends on V CCB .                   |
|     8 | VCCB   | SYSTEM-2 supply voltage (1.2V to 3.6V)                     |

---
## Table 8-2. Data Transmission Sequence

---

|   STATE | DIR CTRL   | IO-1   | IO-2   | DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                           |
|---------|------------|--------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|       1 | H          | Output | Input  | SYSTEM-1 data to SYSTEM-2                                                                                                             |
|       2 | H          | Hi-Z   | Hi-Z   | SYSTEM-2 is getting ready to send data to SYSTEM-1. IO-1 and IO-2 are disabled. The bus-line state depends on pullup or pulldown. (1) |
|       3 | L          | Hi-Z   | Hi-Z   | DIR bit is flipped. IO-1 and IO-2 still are disabled. The bus-line state depends on pullup or pulldown. (1)                           |
|       4 | L          | Input  | Output | SYSTEM-2 data to SYSTEM-1                                                                                                             |

---
## 8.4.2 Layout Example

---

| DIR   | D2   | D1   | GND   |
|-------|------|------|-------|
| B2    | C2   | C1   | A2    |
| B1    | B2   | B1   | A1    |
| VCCB  | A2   | A1   | VCCA  |
